title: An Open-Source Maintainer's Guide to Saying No
comments_summary:

[1] jlowin:
I'm not sure if it's the same in the US, but in the UK it's a legal requirement to provide a means to manually operate automatic doors in the event of a power failure.

That seems like the sensible approach.
